itunes:title: 02 The Spartan Woman, Part 1
title: 02 The Spartan Woman, Part 1
description: "Come back with this or on it." Probably the most famous quotation from a Spartan woman. The Spartan culture was a warrior culture and this expose describes the influence of Spartan mothers.
content:encoded: "Come back with this or on it." Probably the most famous quotation from a Spartan woman. The Spartan culture was a warrior culture and this expose describes the influence of Spartan mothers.
itunes:author: Steven Pressfield
